Context:
The TLC (Tutoring and Learning Centre) at George Brown College offers in-person and online tutoring. To use the online booking system and book an appointment, one must first register for an account. Instructional videos are available to guide users through the registration and appointment access processes. All appointments are booked online. For assistance with booking, contact the TLC at 416-415-2000 or ask.george@georgebrown.ca. The college's social media hub is also available for additional information. Students should verify George Brown College fee requirements as the information on the website may change without notice.

Contact details:
Phone number: 416-415-2000
Email address: ask.george@georgebrown.ca

Website: Implicit (as provided in the text)
Social media hub: Implicit (as provided in the text)

Registration and appointment processes are done online, using the TLC's booking system. Instructional videos are available for guidance.

TLC services are available for both in-person and online tutoring.

Students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements.
